attributes.action: ensure that his Premiership is not undermined by his failure to honour his Party’s manifesto promise of a national referendum before the signing of a document (whether it be known as a Constitution or a Treaty) that will fundamentally alter the way in which this country is governed and by whom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is vital that Gordon Brown is not remembered as the last Prime Minister of this country - the man who sold the British public into a subservience they were never given the opportunity to vote against.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
